enables_user_action: User can navigate to /dashboard and view all uploaded files with filtering by status, sorting by multiple fields, and expanding cards to see full summaries
accessibility: WCAG 2.1 AA compliant - keyboard navigation via Tab, ARIA labels on filters/sort, screen reader announcements for status updates, visible focus indicators, proper heading hierarchy
responsive: Mobile-first design - 1 column on mobile, 2 columns on tablet (md), 3 columns on desktop (xl), touch targets 44x44px minimum
notes: Dashboard page fully functional with client-side interactivity. Consumes backend API with proper error handling, loading states, and empty states. All ShadCN components were pre-installed. Tests written covering render, interaction, and accessibility scenarios.
